channel.title: Product management on Andy Grunwald

item.title: Book review on "Inspired: How to Create Tech Products Customers Love" by Marty Cagan
item.description: tl;dr: It is excellent! Highly recommended, especially if you are working in the tech/internet industry, want to develop your product further, or get insights into this complex role of Product Management. Go, buy, and read it!
